title: Is design an invention or a discovery? - Quora

response.answer_text: Invention. Design is something you develop with someone else’s software .so its an invention Only if you are finding out something which is naturally pre-existing . which no one else has found (or) seen before you are a discoverer . Example : If you are the first person to find gravity, first person to discover a new place you are a discoverer Invention is combining natural source or products to make a new product (or) also combining man made products to make a new product Invention involves the process of Creation where as discovery is only finding out pre-existing. Similarity : Both is applicable only if its found for first time. Every thing in this world will either be a discovery or an invention. Thank You
“Is design an invention or a discovery?” It’s a process of creative problem-solving. Both invention and discovery are involved in that process.
